EmailTemplate.subject: Grounded, You Could Be!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Do you know that by 2020 all aircraft must transmit Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) information when flying in European and US air-space? Military aircraft that do not have ADS-B out will be required to request access to fly. Don't get caught out on critical missions with red tape and forms. Honeywell can help to update your fleet in time if you take action now <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/ADSBMilitaryMandate.html]]>
WATCH VIDEOÂ <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_bNDixio3sU&feature=youtu.be]]>
May The Forms. Not Be With You!
